name: show_history
description: Shows all images you have uploaded in a pageable list.

pagesize.description: The number of images to display per page, with a maximum of 100.

page.description: The page number to return, starting at 0.

name: transform_your_images
description: Apply various transformations to images using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

grayscale.description: If True, convert the image to grayscale. Defaults to None.

rotate.description: Degrees to rotate the image. Defaults to 90.

blur.description: Level of blurriness to apply to the image. Defaults to 4.

resize.description: New dimensions for resizing the image in the format 'width,height'. Defaults to '100,100'.
